function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fragmentation of urban planning and service delivery functions","Impact":"Undermines the ability of cities to face pandemics","Mitigation":"Integrated and holistic strategic planning processes","Technologies":"ICTs for integrated planning","People":"City residents, government officials","Owner":"City governments"},{"Description":"Limited implementation of contingency theory and principal-agent theory in public administration","Impact":"Difficulty in defining strategic position and centralized decision making","Mitigation":"Policy and strategy training, stakeholder engagement","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, data analytics","People":"Policymakers, strategy practitioners","Owner":"Public administration"},{"Description":"Competition for development leading to integration of planning and performance measurement","Impact":"Risk of neglecting sustainability commitments","Mitigation":"Emphasizing sustainability as a key development factor, implementing sustainable practices","Technologies":"Sustainable city technologies, performance measurement tools","People":"City planners, developers","Owner":"Development agencies"}]}
